articles.title: Use Amazon MSK Connect and Iceberg Kafka Connect to build a real-time data lake
articles.original_title: Use Amazon MSK Connect and Iceberg Kafka Connect to build a real-time data lake
articles.summary: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Iceberg Kafka Connect with Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (Amazon MSK) Connect to accelerate real-time data ingestion into data lakes, simplifying the synchronization process from transactional databases to Apache Iceberg tables.

videos.original_title: The Job Search Mindset Nobody Talks About
videos.summary:
Getting rejected in the job search hurts, especially after multiple interview rounds.

But here’s the truth:
Rejection doesn’t mean you’re not good enough. It just means it wasn’t the right match.

In this unscripted video, I share a tough-love message to help you stay confident, keep applying,...
